name: Spyglass Board Games
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Check out the full version of Spyglass, a fun new take on classic board games, like Chess, Checkers, Mancala, and Reversi. Play with a friend on Xbox LIVE, or play against the computer. Use the Xbox Live Vision camera to personalize the game board, playing pieces, and video effects. Each game has custom pieces to choose from, such as a rook made of stone or a furry checkers piece. And you can customize the look with textures like marble, silver, and gel. Make each game your very own! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
